labels.analysis: The HubSpot MCP Server is designed to interact with the HubSpot CRM for managing "Note" engagements. It allows users to create, update, delete, fetch, and send summary records, which enhances workflow productivity and communication. The tools provided focus on managing CRM-related data, particularly notes and engagements, with operations like filtering by date, time, and other criteria. The server enables streamlined communication by allowing records to be sent via chat or email, integrating CRM functions into collaborative workflows.
labels.reasoning: The primary label is "Daily Productivity" because the server's primary functionality revolves around managing notes and engagements in HubSpot CRM, which directly enhances daily workflow efficiency and productivity. The secondary label "CRM Integration" captures the server's specific focus on HubSpot CRM operations, and "Communication Tools" highlights its capability to send records via chat or email. These labels together describe the server's core use cases and problem-solving areas.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: HubSpot MCP Server
server_info_crawled.author: @KaranThink41/hubspot_private_app
server_info_crawled.overview: Interact seamlessly with HubSpot CRM to manage your Note engagements. Create, update, delete, and fetch summary records effortlessly, enhancing your workflow and productivity. Streamline your communication by sending records via chat or email directly from the server.

tools.name: create_shared_summary
tools.description: Deploy Server HubSpot MCP Server @KaranThink41/hubspot_private_app Try in Playground create_shared_summary

tools.name: get_summaries
tools.description: Retrieve summary notes from HubSpot with flexible filters. Optional filters: • date: (YYYY-MM-DD) to filter by a specific date. • dayOfWeek: e.g., 'Monday' to filter by day of the week. • limit: Number of most recent summaries to return. • timeRange: { start: 'HH:MM', end: 'HH:MM' } to filter by time of day.

tools.name: update_shared_summary
tools.description: Step 1: Provide an explicit Engagement ID OR a search query (query) to locate the note. Step 2: Retrieve the current note content. Step 3: Merge existing values with any provided updates (title, summary, author). Step 4: Update the note while preserving unchanged fields.

tools.name: delete_shared_summary
tools.description: Delete a summary note from HubSpot. Either provide an explicit Engagement ID (id) or use optional filters (date, dayOfWeek, limit, timeRange) to select a candidate note (e.g., 'delete my last summary').

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@KaranThink41/hubspot_private_app/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
